project.description:
Release build of ControlCenter OnPrem version 8.1.0.1 (patch)
     - branch: //depot/Destiny/D_Nimbus/release/8.1.0.1/main/...

scm.projectOptions: noallwrite clobber nocompress unlocked nomodtime rmdir

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
set +x export NLEXTERNALDIR=D:/P4/external export NLEXTERNALDIR2=D:/P4/main_external export JAVA_HOME=$NLEXTERNALDIR2/j2sdk/jdk1.7.0_71
export DESTINY_OPENAZ_NODEJS_SRC_TREE_ROOT=D:/Jenkins/workspace/source_destiny-openaz-nodejs_Nimbus_release_8.1.0 export DESTINY_UI_SRC_TREE_ROOT=D:/Jenkins/workspace/source_destiny-ui_Nimbus_OnPremise export TECHPUBS_HELP_ROOT=D:/Jenkins/workspace/destiny-Nimbus-8.1-help-OnPremise
set +x echo "################################################################################" echo "INFO: Git info about current state of DESTINY_OPENAZ_NODEJS_SRC_TREE_ROOT" echo "INFO: DESTINY_OPENAZ_NODEJS_SRC_TREE_ROOT is ${DESTINY_OPENAZ_NODEJS_SRC_TREE_ROOT}" cd ${DESTINY_OPENAZ_NODEJS_SRC_TREE_ROOT}/ git show --quiet HEAD echo "################################################################################"
echo "################################################################################" echo "INFO: Git info about current state of DESTINY_UI_SRC_TREE_ROOT" echo "INFO: DESTINY_UI_SRC_TREE_ROOT is ${DESTINY_UI_SRC_TREE_ROOT}" cd ${DESTINY_UI_SRC_TREE_ROOT}/ git show --quiet HEAD echo "################################################################################"
echo "################################################################################" echo "INFO: Git info about current state of TECHPUBS_HELP_ROOT" echo "INFO: TECHPUBS_HELP_ROOT is ${TECHPUBS_HELP_ROOT}" cd ${TECHPUBS_HELP_ROOT}/ git show --quiet HEAD echo "################################################################################" set -x
cd ${WORKSPACE} source ./setEnv ./buildRelease
## EOF ##
